snippet.title: SAGA 4: Voodoo Castle walkthrough (Apple II - Adventure International)
snippet.description:
"The Count of Monte Cristo reposes in a coffin in his musty castle, awaiting an able assist from YOU to remove the curse that binds him to non-life. Is he down for the Count for good, or can you help? Gather your rabbit's foot, arcane charms and courage, Good Sir or Madam, and prepare to step through the portal of ... VOODOO CASTLE"

Voodoo Castle (https://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/voodoo-castle) was a graphics adventure game published by Adventure International in 1982 for the Apple ][. The game is #4 in the Scott Adams Graphics Adventure (SAGA) series. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mocagh.com
Walkthrough - www.solutionarchive.com (Jacob Gunness)
Disk image - 4AM
